segments.text: Janice , I found you stole my vegetables at four o'clock this morning . Is that true ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right ! I stayed up yesterday and waited for your vegetables . I stole your peaches and flowers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is so hard to prevent them from being stolen . I also got something this morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many vegetables do you steal today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I stole many from Fred's farm , and from yours . I planned to have a dog on farm .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So funny . By stealing , I forgot all my sorrows and pressure from work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I could not agree with you more . For us , there are so many unhappy things and I am so bored ; however , I got lots of fun from stealing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really want to be far away from the reality now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But we still need to go back to it . Don't overdo it .
segments.speaker: S2
